arts.ttl: Confirmed Lineups: Arminia Bielefeld v VfB Stuttgart
arts.sum: Lineups are confirmed for this season’s DFB Pokal final.

arts.ttl: 5 reasons VfB Stuttgart can win the DFB Cup against Arminia Bielefeld
arts.sum: “I see the overall development as positive – and we want to refine it in a week's time at the DFB Cup final in Berlin,” said Hoeneß after seeing his team twice bounce back from a goal down to win 3-2 on Matchday 34. In 73 participations – the third-most in German football history – Stuttgart have only ever lost three DFB Cup ties to third division clubs, most recently to Hansa Rostock in 2018/19, the last time they were knocked out by a lower league team.

arts.ttl: 5 reasons Arminia Bielefeld can beat VfB Stuttgart to win the DFB Cup
arts.sum: Arminia Bielefeld have just won the third division title but are now hoping to return to Bundesliga 2 as DFB Cup winners - bundesliga.com gives you five reasons why they can make history and defeat top-flight VfB Stuttgart in Berlin on Saturday. If Stuttgart are in any doubt about Bielefeld's quality, they should bear in mind this statistic: Xabi Alonso had not lost a DFB Cup tie since taking charge at Bayer Leverkusen in the 2023/24 campaign until his team was beaten in the semi-finals.

arts.ttl: DFB Pokal Final Preview: Arminia Bielefeld vs Stuttgart
arts.sum: VfB Stuttgart will look to lift their first DFB Pokal for the first time since 1997, but they will have to overcome 3. Liga side Arminia Bielefeld who are enjoying…

arts.ttl: VfB Stuttgart vs. Arminia Bielefeld preview: Surprise packages clash for Pokal glory
arts.sum: In the season of underdogs, either Stuttgart or Bielefeld will win the German cup for the first time in the 21st century.
